Class Com

  • java.lang.Object
    • Com

  • public class Com
extends java.lang.Object
    Class taking care of the messages in the bus It's a middleware to supply the guava library A Lamport object can check its messages through mailboxes

      • onToken

        public void onToken(Token t)
        Describes how to handle the token (to deal with critical sections), depending on the attribute stateToken
        Parameters:
        t - The message to read

      • request

        public void request()
        Should be called when a critical section is starting, you get the token Don't forget to use release() afterwards

      • release

        public void release()
        Should be used when a critical section is ending, to give the token to the next one Use request() beforehand, to get the token

      • startToken

        public void startToken()
        Should be used at the very start, the last Process created will get the token, to start the cycle
